entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView Drag and Drop Reordering Can't Drop in Empty Group #12008
  • Dock > Fill dropdown values missing for a BlazorWebView control #12006
    Backlog
  • [Spec] Keyboard Specs for .NET8 #12004
  • Add TextInput property so users can enable/disable if they want tapping outside on an input field to close the keyboard #12003
  • [Android] When a user taps off of an input control the keyboard no longer closes #12002
  • CollectionView/ListView call setters of bound objects unnecessarily #12001
  • LineHeight property on label affects "invisible" line 0 and pushes all other texts down #11998
  • error MSB4019: The imported project "C:\Program Files\dotnet\packs\Microsoft.iOS.Sdk\16.0.1478\tools\msbuild\iOS\Xamarin.iOS.VB.targets" was not found. #11997
  • some images are rendered at the bottom of the page on ios #11996
  • custom font on android only partly loaded: #11995
  • Border margin issue #11994
    Backlog
  • Allow user to draw on image using draw view control in maui #11993
    Backlog
  • [BUG} PlatformImage.FromStream doesn't create an IImage, returns null #11992
  • NET MAUI iOS, the background color is always gray when the CollectionView is selected #11991
  • Frame does not render border correctly while corner radius specified on windows platform #11990
  • Android 12 SplashScreen not working #11988
  • BindableLayout - Invalid height rendered #11987
  • Icons in TabBar for iOS/Mac Catalyst are not sized correctly #11984

Closed

  • Winform Blazor Support JavaScript #11814
  • App crashes only in release mode and only when using AOT #8337
  • Android Release mode build doesn't work #11901
  • Android "No compatible code running on the thread" and crash after hit continue #11837
  • Disabling iOS and Android platform targeting in a Maui project file breaks the publish menu option #11816
  • How to set zoom level of WebView Control in MAUI? #11985
  • [Android] Navigation - PushModal - Page Margin (offset) #11855
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Toolbar icon image not perfectly center. #11786
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Development.md #12005
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [Tizen] Add requesting re-layout step #11986
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, platform/tizen

Merged

  • [net7.0] Prepare MAUI to support building with NuGets #12000
    area/setup 🪄
  • Prepare MAUI to support building with NuGets #11946
    area/setup 🪄
  • Update Essentials Flashlight API Docs #11920
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials MainThread API Docs #11934
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Update Editor.cs To solve HorizontalTextAlignment problem #10981
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Added StartPath to get/set initial BlazorWebView URL #11942
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #10522
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Address Android SearchBar keyboard issue relating to TextTransform #11981
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [xamlc] remove `LoadInSeparateAppDomain` and `static` state #11982
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Update Essentials FileSystem API Docs #11919
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix crash typing in Shell SearchHandler #11927
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, version/ios-16
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Clear before each Image Source change #11787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
